title: Elegant Diamond Mangalsutra: A Modern Take on the Traditional Nalla Pusala Danda
features: A delicate rose gold chain interspersed with traditional black onyx beads. Five uniquely designed diamond clusters are suspended from the chain, adding a modern touch to this classic symbol of marriage. The clusters are set in a prong setting, ensuring maximum brilliance from the stones.
occasions: any day you want to celebrate your marital bond.
description: This Mangalsutra beautifully bridges the gap between tradition and modernity. The classic combination of black beads and gold is elevated by the dazzling diamond clusters, making it a versatile piece that can be worn every day. The rose gold lends a contemporary and stylish feel, while the traditional black onyx beads symbolize protection and strength. Perfect for the modern Telugu bride or any woman who cherishes the sanctity of marriage.
